webscript.shortname: Get Workflow Instance. Koya permissions aware
webscript.description: Retrieves a specific workflow instance, optionally with all the tasks.

arg.description: The id of workflow process instance to retrieve.
Determines whether the response contains all the tasks that belong to the workflow instance. If this argument is omitted no tasks will be returned.
